name: abide by
explain: to accept and act according to a law, an agreement.
mean: (v) (+ by) trung thành với, giữ, tuân theo

name: agreement
explain: an arrangement, a promise or a contract made with somebody.
mean: (n) hợp đồng, thỏa ước, hiệp nghị / sự thỏa thuận

name: assurance
explain: a statement that something will certainly be true or will certainly happen.
mean: (n) sự cam đoan, bảo đảm, chắc chắn; sự tin chắc, tự tin

name: cancellation
explain: a decision to stop something that has already been arranged from happening.
mean: (n) sự hủy bỏ, sự hủy / vé hủy, vé bỏ

name: determine
explain: to discover the facts about something.
mean: (v) quyết định, xác định, định rõ; quyết tâm, kiên quyết

name: engage
explain: occupy, attract, or involve (someone's interest or attention).
mean: (v) tham gia, cam kết / (n) sự hứa hẹn

name: establish
explain: to start or create an organization, a system.
mean: (v) thiết lập, thành lập; xác minh, chứng minh, củng cố

name: obligate
explain: to bind legally or morally.
mean: (v) bắt buộc, ép buộc

name: party
explain: one of the people or groups of people involved in a legal agreemen.
mean: (n) đảng, phái, đội, nhóm; người tham dự/tham gia;

name: provision
explain: a condition or an arrangement in a legal document.
mean: (n) sự dự liệu, dự trữ, dự phòng, cung cấp; điều khoản

name: resolve
explain: to find an acceptable solution to a problem.
mean: (v) giải quyết, (n) sự kiên quyết / sự tin chắc

name: specific
explain: detailed abd exact.
mean: (adj) riêng biệt, cụ thể, đặc trưng; rõ ràng, rành mạch

name: attract
explain: to draw by appeal.
mean: (v) hấp dẫn, lôi cuốn, thu hút

name: compare
explain: to examine people or things to see how they are similar and how they are different.
mean: (v) so sánh, đối chiếu

name: competition
explain: a situation in which people or organizations compete with each other for something that not everyone can have.
mean: (v) (sự/cuộc) cạnh tranh, tranh giành, thi đấu

name: consume
explain: to use something, especially fuel, engery or time.
mean: (v) tiêu thụ, tiêu dùng

name: convince
explain: to make somebody / yourselft believe that something is true.
mean: (v) thuyết phục

name: currently
explain: at the present time.
mean: (adv) hiện thời, hiện nay, lúc này

name: fad
explain: something that people are interested in for only a short period of time.
mean: (n) mốt nhất thời, sự thích thú tạm thời; dở hơi, gàn dở

name: inspiration
explain: a thing or person that arouses a feeling.
mean: (n) (sự/người/vật) truyền cảm hứng, gây cảm hứng

name: market
explain: to advertise and offer a product for sale.
mean: (n) thị trường, chợ, nơi mua bán sản phẩm

name: persuasion
explain: the power to influence, a deep conviction or belief.
mean: (n) (sự) thuyết phục, làm cho tin (chú ý: persuade > convince)

name: productive
explain: making goods or growing crops.
mean: (adj) sản xuất, sinh sản; sinh lợi nhiều, có hiệu quả

name: satisfaction
explain: the good feeling that you have when you have achieved something.
mean: (n) sự làm thỏa mãn, sự hài lòng
